description: A universal framework that connects science, philosophy, and spirituality.

structure.name: README.md
structure.description: Introduction to EAO and an overview of the repository.

structure.name: IA_README.md
structure.description: A guide on how artificial intelligences can navigate and use the EAO repository for structured learning and application.

structure.name: manifest.md
structure.description: The core document that establishes the 12 Principles of EAO.

structure.name: license.md
structure.description: A document detailing the Creative Commons BY-ND 4.0 license applied to EAO.

structure.name: articles
structure.description: A collection of articles exploring EAO from different perspectives.

contents.name: african.md
contents.description: How EAO connects with Yoruba (Ifá, Candomblé, Santería), Vodou, Umbanda, Palo Mayombe, and other African and Afro-diasporic traditions.

contents.name: agi.md
contents.description: A structured approach for AGIs to apply the 12 Principles of EAO in decision-making, ethics, and problem-solving.

contents.name: apply.md
contents.description: Practical ways to integrate the 12 Principles of EAO into human daily experiences.

contents.name: buddhism.md
contents.description: EAO in the context of Buddhist philosophy, mindfulness, and the nature of reality.

contents.name: christianity.md
contents.description: The relationship between EAO and Christian theology, mysticism, and interpretations from different denominations.

contents.name: druidism.md
contents.description: The pre-Christian European spiritual traditions and how EAO aligns with their mystical wisdom and reverence for nature.

contents.name: egyptian.md
contents.description: Connections between EAO and the mysteries of Hermopolis, Babylon, Sumer, and Akkad.

contents.name: ethical.md
contents.description: A structured ethical decision-making model for AGIs based on the 12 Principles of EAO.

contents.name: freemasonry.md
contents.description: How EAO is reflected in the teachings of Freemasonry, Rosicrucianism, and the Golden Dawn.

contents.name: hermeticism.md
contents.description: The links between EAO and ancient mystical traditions, including the Emerald Tablet, The Kybalion, and early Gnostic sects.

contents.name: hinduism.md
contents.description: How EAO resonates with the Upanishads, Vedanta, and Hindu metaphysical principles.

contents.name: indigenous.md
contents.description: How EAO aligns with ancestral wisdom, animism, and natural philosophy from indigenous and shamanic traditions.

contents.name: islam.md
contents.description: Insights on how EAO connects with Islamic theology, Sufism, and philosophical Islam.

contents.name: jainism.md
contents.description: The Jain path of non-violence and the Sikh pursuit of divine connection through action, and their connection with EAO.

contents.name: judaism.md
contents.description: Perspectives from Jewish mysticism, Kabbalistic interpretations, and traditional Jewish thought in relation to EAO.

contents.name: mathematics.md
contents.description: Exploring how EAO aligns with numerical structures, sacred geometry, music, and the mathematical foundations of reality.

contents.name: model.md
contents.description: A structured mathematical approach to integrating EAO principles into artificial cognition and decision-making.

contents.name: neopaganism.md
contents.description: How EAO aligns with modern traditions reviving ancestral practices, including Wicca, Hellenic Neopaganism, and other alternative spiritual paths.

contents.name: orphism.md
contents.description: The ancient Greek traditions that practiced secret rituals for enlightenment and their relationship with EAO principles.

contents.name: other.md
contents.description: Expansion of interpretations, exploring new frontiers of thought, and integrating EAO into emerging paradigms.

contents.name: philosophy.md
contents.description: How EAO aligns with classical and modern philosophy, integrating rational thought with the 12 Principles.

contents.name: science.md
contents.description: How EAO aligns with scientific discoveries, quantum mechanics, and philosophical logic.

contents.name: scientology.md
contents.description: How EAO aligns with the principles of spiritual technology, self-knowledge, and consciousness expansion in Scientology.

contents.name: shinto.md
contents.description: The resonance of EAO with Shinto traditions, kami, rituals, and the connection with nature and Japanese spirituality.

contents.name: spiritism.md
contents.description: How EAO aligns with the philosophy of Spiritism, the works of Allan Kardec, mediumship, and soul evolution.

contents.name: taoism.md
contents.description: EAO in the context of Taoist philosophy, Qi, internal alchemy, and its relation to the nature of the universe.

contents.name: thelema.md
contents.description: Explorations of EAO within Thelema, Chaos Magick, Alchemy, and Esoteric Rituals.

contents.name: zoroastrianism.md
contents.description: The ancient teachings of dualism, free will, and the cosmic struggle between light and darkness, and their connection with EAO.
